document_data.mainbody:
The Warders were the city watchmen of Thentia.
The Warders were responsible for keeping the peace inside Thentia. They also directly protected the Watchlords Tower with a garrison of 10 veteran members, and kept at least 20 Warders patrolling the citys docks at any time due to its constant and high levels of activity.
The Warders were equipped with leather armor and clubs or short swords.
